scripts.install-tidepool: npm install https://github.com/brian-tidepool/tidepool-cli && cd node_modules/tidepool-cli && npm install && npm run build && npx copyfiles -f src/data/*.json dist/data/
scripts.clean-install: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json playwright-report test-results && npm install && npm run install-tidepool && npx playwright install
